Question
========

A sample of 8 individuals was randomly drawn from a population in which a particular variable was measured. The scores of the individuals are: 8, 23, 15, 21, 11, 15, 19, 12. We want to test whether μ = 15, with α
= 0.05 two-sided. The boundaries of the critical area are then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* ± 1.86
* ± 1.96
* ± 2.31
* ± 2.36

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

± 1.86: Incorrect ± 1.96: Incorrect ± 2.31: Incorrect ± 2.36: Correct
